pr_title: Clean up code sample and other docs

timeline.message: Clean up code sample and other docs

timeline.bodyText: title seems wrong, it's about creating a batch source, not adding batching to a source
timeline.author: cangencer
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -1,28 +1,25 @@
 ---
-title: Create a Batch Source
+title: Add Batching to Custom Source

replies.bodyText: Actually the only new point this How-To introduces is the batching. Originally there was a tutorial, then it got split into the "basics" which are in Sources and Sinks and this how-to, which explains how to add batching.
replies.author: mtopolnik

replies.bodyText: ok, but it's confusing if user is trying to look for how to create a custom source, not just add batching to it, where 's the entry point?
replies.author: cangencer

replies.bodyText: In the section titled "Sources and Sinks", subsection "Custom Sources and Sinks". This How-To links to it in the first paragraph.
replies.author: mtopolnik

timeline.bodyText: can we align the ); on the next line? it's easier to read like that.
timeline.author: cangencer
